about_the_game:
WHAT IS DEATH REMAINS?

Death Remains is a relentless open-world survival game where the dead never rest—and neither do you. Face off against overwhelming zombie hordes and ever-shifting factions in a world where permadeath forces you to choose wisely at every turn.

HOW YOU PLAY!

Whether you dive into online multiplayer on player-run servers hosting up to 100 players or team up in local co-op for up to four, the challenge is real. Roam vast landscapes where day gives way to night, winter encroaches, and nature slowly reclaims deserted cities. Experience dynamic events such as reactivating power plants and transforming trains into mobile bases for transport and supplies.

Your survival hinges on every choice—from scavenging for scarce resources and crafting weapons to constructing fortified shelters by felling trees and sawing wood. Navigate treacherous terrain in physics-driven vehicles while honing your skills in carpentry, cooking, farming, fishing, and more—all while battling hunger, thirst, illness, and other hardships.

FACTION SYSTEM - NEVER BE ALONE AND BORED

The world comes alive with diverse NPCs and factions. Some offer alliances or trade, while others have their sights set on your demise. Engage in everything from tense negotiations to fierce combat, and even hunt local wildlife to supplement your supplies. Every interaction adds a unique twist to your survival tale.

MODDING SUPPORT

For creative minds, Death Remains will launch with full modding support, giving you the power to reshape the experience and share your unique creations with the community. From custom scripts to entirely new features, you’ll have the freedom to mold this unforgiving world to your liking. A comprehensive documentation will be available at release, guiding you step by step in bringing your ideas to life.

WHAT YOU GET

For those new to this brutal realm, a brief story mode offers a gripping introduction, teaching you the survival basics while immersing you in the harsh realities of Death Remains. Choose how you want to play:

  • Singleplayer Tutorial: Learn the ropes at your own pace.

  • Co-op: Team up with friends to endure the dangers together.

  • Multiplayer: Put your survival instincts to the test in high-stakes encounters against other players.

Join our Discord for more information!

content_descriptors.notes: Death Remains is a mature game featuring intense violence in a post-apocalyptic world. Players face graphic zombie combat with vivid blood effects and brutal encounters woven throughout the experience. There is no explicit sexual content, non-consensual scenes, or portrayals of substance abuse; the mature themes arise solely from the game's harsh survival challenges.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows  11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5/i7 (3.0 GHz+) or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580 (4 GB VRAM or more)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows  11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7/i9 (4.0 GHz+) or AMD Ryzen 7/9 (equivalent)
  • Memory: 32 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce RTX 3070 / AMD Radeon RX 6800 (8 GB VRAM or more)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

short_description: Enter Death Remains: an open-world, permadeath survival. Scavenge, build, and barter or battle factions across a harsh sandbox. Master ruthless RPG skills, but remember—when you die, Death Remains.
supported_languages:
English*, German
*languages with full audio support
